title: Abdelhak Saihi - Wikipedia
snippet: Abelhak Saihi is the Algerian Minister of Health, Population and Hospital Reform. He was appointed as minister on 9 September 2022.

title: Abdelhak Saihi takes duties as minister of Health
snippet: ALGIERS- Abdelhak Saihi took Friday office as Minister of Health, replacing Abderrahmane Benbouzid, after the ministerial reshuffle carried out by President of the Republic, Abdelmadjid Tebboune.

title: Abdelhak Saihi takes up new duties at head of Ministry of Health | DZ Breaking
snippet: ALGIERS – Abdelhak Saihi took up, on Friday, his new duties at the head of the Ministry of Health, replacing Mr. Abderrahmane Benbouzid following the ministerial reshuffle carried out by the President of the Republic Mr.

title: Health Minister receives OMS Representative
snippet: ALGIERS- Minister of Health, Abdelhak Saihi, received the Representative of the World Health Organization (OMS) in Algeria, Phanuel Hbaimana, with whom he discussed ways to strengthen cooperation, said the ministry in a communiqué.
